details.overview: Record the details of scheduled delegated driving tests with the Driving Standards Agency
details.more_information:
##Tests you must record

You must record the details of the following tests:

- licence acquisition tests
- Driver Certificate of Professional Competence (CPC) practical tests

$D [Download ‘A guide to delegated examiner test notifications’ (PDF, 745KB)](http://assets.dft.gov.uk/dsa-bl/dsa_delegated_examiner_test_notifications_user_guide.pdf "Download ‘A guide to delegated examiner test notifications’ (PDF, 745KB)"){:rel="external"} $D

##Paying for Driver CPC tests

You have to pay to record Driver CPC test details. You can pay in 2 ways:

- by debit or credit card
- by debit from a pre-funded account

A pre-funded account lets you deposit funds with the Driving Standards Agency (DSA) in advance and pay the fee by debiting the amount directly from your account.

##Apply for a pre-funded account

To apply for a pre-funded account, download the terms and conditions, sign the document and send it to the DSA. 

$D [Download ‘Use of pre-funded accounts for DSA services - terms and conditions’ (PDF, 35KB)](http://assets.dft.gov.uk/dsa-bl/dsa_prefunded_accounts_terms_conditions.pdf "Download ‘Use of pre-funded accounts for DSA services - terms and conditions’ (PDF, 35KB)"){:rel="external"} $D

$A

Driving Standards Agency
PO Box 280
Newcastle-upon-Tyne
NE99 1FP

$A

###Help with your pre-funded account

You can download the user guide to using a pre-funded account.

$D [Download ‘Pre-funded accounts user guide’ (PDF, 407KB)](http://assets.dft.gov.uk/dsa-bl/dsa_prefunded_accounts_user_guide.pdf "Download ‘Pre-funded accounts user guide’ (PDF, 407KB)"){:rel="external"} $D

You can also contact the DSA if you need help.

$C

**DSA helpline**

<pfa@dsa.gsi.gov.uk>  
**Telephone:** 0300 200 1122  
Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm

$C

*[CPC]: Certificate of Professional Competence
*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency
